translation: As the sun, I give heat; I withhold and send forth the rain; I am immortality and also death, existence and non-existence, O Arjuna.
commentary: 9.19 Tapami give heat? I'm I? I'm I? year rain? I withhold withhold? I'm sending send forth? f and? Amritam immortality? f and? Eve also? Death: death? f and? Sat existence? Unreal nonexistence? f and? I'm I? Arjuna O Arjuna.Commentary I radiate heat in the form of the sun. I send forth the rain in the form of Indra in the rainy season and I take it back during the rest of the year.Sat Existence? the
